text: Daniel "Dan" Harmon (born January 3, 1973) is an American writer, producer and voice actor. He is best known for creating the NBC comedy series Community (2009–2015). He also co-created the animated Adult Swim sitcom Rick and Morty (2013–present) with Justin Roiland. He voices the character Bird Person on Rick and Morty. Harmon was born in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. He was married to Erin McGathy from 2014 to 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Milwaukee Category:American screenwriters Category:American television writers Category:American voice actors Category:Writers from Wisconsin
title: Dan Harmon
